it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class ActionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ActionManager

  • public class ActionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to manage the possible actions in a round
    Author:
    Federico Inncoente

    • Method Detail

      • sendPossibleMoves

        public void sendPossibleMoves()
        Send to the player the possible destination for a move action

      • performMove

        public void performMove(int positionX,
                        int positionY)
        Perform the move action of a player
        Parameters:
        positionX - is the row of the destination
        positionY - is the column of the destination

      • sendPossibleGrabs

        public void sendPossibleGrabs()
        Send to the player the possible destination of a grab action

      • performGrab

        public void performGrab(int positionX,
                        int positionY)
        Move the player on target location of the grab action. If the destination is a basic square, grab the ammo tile. If the destination is a spawn square, send a request to the player with the weapons he can grab
        Parameters:
        positionX - is the row of the destination
        positionY - is the column of the destination

      • manageShot

        public void manageShot()
        Manage the request of a shot action: if the player can perform a move, send the possible destination, otherwise send the possible weapon to shot with

      • managePreEffectShot

        public void managePreEffectShot(int x,
                                int y)
        Perform the move before a shot action
        Parameters:
        x - is the destination row
        y - is the destination column

      • saveWeapon

        public void saveWeapon(java.lang.String weapon)
        Save the weapons chosen for the shot action in the round manager
        Parameters:
        weapon - is the name of the chosen weapon

      • sendPossibleEffects

        public void sendPossibleEffects()
        Send a request to the player with the possible effect to perform with the chosen weapon

      • setWeaponUnloaded

        public void setWeaponUnloaded()
        Set the weapon unloaded an go to the next phase

      • askForEffectPay

        public void askForEffectPay(int chosenEffect)
        Send a request with the possible payment modes to pay the chosen effect
        Parameters:
        chosenEffect - is the number of the effect chosen by the player

      • payEffect

        public void payEffect(java.lang.String[] powerUpsType,
                      CubeColour[] powerUpsColour)
        Perform the effect payment with the powerUp chosen by the player
        Parameters:
        powerUpsType - is an array with the type of the powerUps chosen by the player
        powerUpsColour - is the colour of the powerUp chosen by the player

      • performWeaponEffect

        public void performWeaponEffect(java.util.List<Character> targetsLite)
        Perform the effect on the chosen target in case of those are other players
        Parameters:
        targetsLite - is a list characters that represent the target players

      • performWeaponEffect

        public void performWeaponEffect(int squareX,
                                int squareY)
        Perform the effect on the chosen target in case of this is a square
        Parameters:
        squareX - is the target's row
        squareY - is the target's column

      • grabWeapon

        public void grabWeapon(java.lang.String weaponChoice)
        Grab a weapon chosen by the player. If the grab is free, perform it, otherwise check for the possible grab modality
        Parameters:
        weaponChoice - is the name of the chosen weapon

      • payWeaponGrab

        public void payWeaponGrab(java.lang.String[] powerUpsType,
                          CubeColour[] powerUpsColour)
        Perform the payment of the weapon grab with the chosen powerUps.
        Parameters:
        powerUpsType - are the chosen powerUps type
        powerUpsColour - are the colour of the chosen powerUps

      • discardWeapon

        public void discardWeapon(java.lang.String weapon)
        Discard the extra weapon chosen by the player, putting it back in the player position spawn square, and setting it loaded
        Parameters:
        weapon - is the name of the chosen weapon

      • askForWeaponReloadPay

        public void askForWeaponReloadPay(java.lang.String weapon)
        Send a request for the reload pay modality
        Parameters:
        weapon - is the name of the weapon that the player want to reload

      • payWeaponReload

        public void payWeaponReload(java.lang.String[] powerUpType,
                            CubeColour[] powerUpColour)
        Pay the weapon reload, using the chosen powerUp if the player chose some
        Parameters:
        powerUpType - are the type of the powerUp chosen by the player
        powerUpColour - are the colour of the powerUp chosen by the player

      • payCost

        public void payCost(int[] cost,
                    java.util.List<PowerUp> powerUps)
        Pay a cost, using a list of powerUps chosen by the player and the remaining with the player's ammo
        Parameters:
        cost - is the pay cost as an integer array in the format Red - Yellow - Blue
        powerUps - is a list of powerUp chosen to pay the effect

      • askForGenericPay

        public void askForGenericPay(java.lang.String powerUpType,
                             CubeColour powerUpColour)
        Send a request for a payment with no condition, that mean that every colour of ammo can be used to perform it. This method is used to play only while-action powerUps
        Parameters:
        powerUpType - is the powerUp type to pay
        powerUpColour - is the powerUp colour to pay

      • usePowerUp

        public void usePowerUp(java.lang.String powerUpChoice,
                       CubeColour powerUpColour)
        Send a request to get the target of the chosen powerUps
        Parameters:
        powerUpChoice - is the chosen powerUp type
        powerUpColour - is the chosen powerUp colour

      • askForSquareTargetsNewton

        public void askForSquareTargetsNewton()
        Send a request for the square target of a Newton powerUp

      • performPowerUp

        public void performPowerUp(java.lang.Object target)
        Perform the effect of the chosen powerUp
        Parameters:
        target - is the chosen target, which could be both a character or a square (depends of the chosen powerUp)

      • endPowerUpPhase

        public void endPowerUpPhase()
        If the player has some, send the request of using end-round powerUps

      • askTargetTargetingScope

        public void askTargetTargetingScope()
        Send a request for the target of the targeting scope powerUp

      • performTargetingScopeEffect

        public void performTargetingScopeEffect(Character target)
        Perform the effect of the targeting scope on the chosen target
        Parameters:
        target - is the character of the chosen target

      • getChosenWeapon

        public Weapon getChosenWeapon()
        Getter method
        Returns:
        the chosen weapon
